explains: v. 预言；受神启示而说（或写）；作为先知；传教

sentences.en: the Lord GOD hath spoken, who can but prophesy?
sentences.cn: 主耶和华发命，谁能不说预言呢。

sentences.en: Ye hypocrites, well did Esaias prophesy of you, saying.
sentences.cn: 假冒为善的人哪，以赛亚指着你们说的预言，是不错的。

sentences.en: Saying, Prophesy unto us, thou Christ, Who is he that smote thee?
sentences.cn: 基督阿，你是先知，告诉我们打你的是谁。
